{"id":1014285734,"question_id":2916,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1691374357,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1014285734/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check if it is Possible to Split Array","memory":"42.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean canSplitArray(List<Integer> nums, int m) {\n        \n        \n        int siz = nums.size();\n        \n        if(siz<=2)\n            return true;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<siz-1; i++){\n            \n            if(nums.get(i) + nums.get(i+1)>=m)\n                return true;\n        }\n        \n        return false;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-if-it-is-possible-to-split-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
